title: Gift of Magic (can you still get it?)
body: What's up Riot :) I was curious about the Gift of Magic icon? My friend and I are both interested in getting it but is it still available? (we have both champs right now but we might just end up gifting it to another friend haha) Was the icon a limited time thing?

replies.body: The Gift of Magic icon was limited during their release, and unavailable now.  :(  There's always a chance it could come back, but how or when is beyond me.  Keep your eyes on the [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page should anything come up.  Sorry fam!
It should return, wasn't able to get enough IP in time. Ended up working that weekend. Bottomless wallets shouldn't get all the fun, really wanted to gift them too. Made me cry.
